claim_card.claim: Quick-start defaults are specified (including k=3, λ=1.5) with a tuning procedure adjusting λ in ±0.2 increments based on NT count realism.
claim_card.test_hook: Run defaults once; inspect NT count per eddy time; adjust λ by ±0.2 until count is plausible.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Adjust λ by ±0.2 increments if NT count is unphysical
